channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Low bridge sign fronting 10, Shortlands Rd, Shortlands (nr jct Mays Hill Rd) has rotated nearly 80 degrees so is no longer facing oncoming traffic., 6th October
item.description:
Low bridge sign fronting 10, Shortlands Rd, Shortlands (nr jct Mays Hill Rd) has rotated nearly 80 degrees so is no longer facing oncoming traffic. It has rotated even more since this photo about 4 days ago. For about the 5th time in 3 years, please find a permanent solution. Eg. drill a pair of bolts through the sign into the pole. Whateveter is there now, eg. jubilee clips, are not holding the large sign in place on the single pole.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Shortlands Road, Shortlands, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Passing motorist reporting the temp traffic lights at junction, 6th October
item.description:
Passing motorist reporting the temp traffic lights at junction of West Moreland road with Kentish way. Unable to see who the lights belong to. Westmoreland Road Bromley BR2 0QL Pavilion Leisure Centre Kentish Way Bromley BR1 3EF
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): St Mary's Avenue, Shortlands, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 6 street lights out, 6th October
item.description:
There are 6 street lights out along Bexley Road between the traffic lights by the petrol station and Blackfen Road. It's very dark and does not feel safe.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 245, Bexley Road, Avery Hill, London

item.title: Outside 1 Honiton in the Road near curb, 6th October
item.description:

item.title: Missing council fencing, 6th October

item.title: Hole getting bigger on The Ivy Bridge., 6th October
item.description:
The Ivy Bridge footpath has a hole in it. It’s growing. Please can this be repaired as soon as possible as the path goes over the railway lines, is made of metal and is rotting.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ivy Bridge, Widmore, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drain still blocked after 2 years of reporting., 6th October
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kentish Way, Plaistow, London

item.title: Leaves and twigs need to be raked and removed, 6th October
item.description:
There was a large pile of cuttings, leaves, twigs and fallen branches just past the ice house and on the right. The branches and large cuttings were removed - thank you. But the leaves and smaller twigs have been scattered in this area. Please can these be raked up again and removed as we don’t want them all blowing into the lake as this is partly why we raked them into a pile before. Thank you.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): The Chase, Widmore, London
Report on FixMyStreet
